well good! on the right track. i have a link in my yahoo profile and my messenger too, so hopefully we can get some folks rollin in soon
   
  amy
  

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
              And now I�m getting the group e-mail ok! 
  
   Frank
  
      
---------------------------------
  
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Frank Sumption
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 11:39 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] That worked!

  
        Hi Amy;

Looks like you made it. I'm goin got try not to control too much 
here, hopefully spammers won't be too much of a problem, and there's 
always the banned button! 

For everyone joining; Welcome to my group, an informal place to 
discuss EVP and related subjects. I do my e-mail from work, 
hopefully my boss won't see this! So mostly I'm here during the 
week day, and as time permits.

There is a file area where members can upload voice examples, and 
even photos, just keep in mind that storage space is limited, so 
don't leave stuff up on a permenant basis, and make sure you create 
your own folder, it makes it easier to keep track of your own stuff.

Thanks!

Frank

  



  

         

 __________________________________________________
